mapper.select: /* drMsMaininfoMapper.selectLoginUser - 아이디/비밀번호로 조회 (로그인) */ SELECT MS_NUM , MS_STATUS , MS_BK_GRANT , MS_DIVISION , MS_LEVEL , MS_LOGIN_CD , MS_LINK , MS_ID , MS_PASSWORD , MS_NAME , MS_ENAME , MS_NICKNAME , MS_IMAGENAME , MS_SEX , MS_BIRTH , MS_BIRTHYL , MS_FIRST_PHONE1 , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_MID_PHONE1), 'YIDO') AS MS_MID_PHONE1 , MS_LAST_PHONE1 , SMS_CHK1 , MS_BLANK , MS_VOUCHER_DAY , MS_WEDDINGDAY , MS_WEDDING , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_EMAIL), 'YIDO') AS MS_EMAIL , MS_EMAIL_YN , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_HOMETEL), 'YIDO') AS MS_HOMETEL , MS_HOMEZIP , MS_HOMEADDR1 , MS_HOMEADDR2 , MS_POST_YN , MS_COMPNM , MS_COMPNO , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_COMPTEL), 'YIDO') AS MS_COMPTEL , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_COMPFAX), 'YIDO') AS MS_COMPFAX , MS_COMPZIP , MS_COMPADDR1 , MS_COMPADDR2 , MS_COMP_POST_YN , MS_COMPDEPT , MS_COMPPOSITION , MS_REGDAY , MS_ENDDAY , MS_REMARK , MS_MKT_AGREE_YN , MS_DORMANT , LOGIN_TIME , MS_DI , INPUT_STAFF , INPUT_DATETIME , INPUT_IP , UPDATE_STAFF , UPDATE_DATETIME , UPDATE_IP FROM DR_MS_MAININFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND MS_ID = #{msId} AND MS_PASSWORD = SHA2(#{msPassword}, 256) AND IFNULL(NULLIF(MS_BLANK,''),'N') = 'N'

/* drMsMaininfoMapper.selectSessionLoginUser - 세션키로 조회 (로그인) */ SELECT MS_NUM , MS_STATUS , MS_BK_GRANT , MS_DIVISION , MS_LEVEL , MS_LOGIN_CD , MS_LINK , MS_ID , MS_PASSWORD , MS_NAME , MS_ENAME , MS_NICKNAME , MS_IMAGENAME , MS_SEX , MS_BIRTH , MS_BIRTHYL , MS_FIRST_PHONE1 , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_MID_PHONE1), 'YIDO') AS MS_MID_PHONE1 , MS_LAST_PHONE1 , SMS_CHK1 , MS_BLANK , MS_VOUCHER_DAY , MS_WEDDINGDAY , MS_WEDDING , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_EMAIL), 'YIDO') AS MS_EMAIL , MS_EMAIL_YN , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_HOMETEL), 'YIDO') AS MS_HOMETEL , MS_HOMEZIP , MS_HOMEADDR1 , MS_HOMEADDR2 , MS_POST_YN , MS_COMPNM , MS_COMPNO , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_COMPTEL), 'YIDO') AS MS_COMPTEL , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_COMPFAX), 'YIDO') AS MS_COMPFAX , MS_COMPZIP , MS_COMPADDR1 , MS_COMPADDR2 , MS_COMP_POST_YN , MS_COMPDEPT , MS_COMPPOSITION , MS_REGDAY , MS_ENDDAY , MS_REMARK , MS_MKT_AGREE_YN , MS_DORMANT , LOGIN_TIME , MS_DI , INPUT_STAFF , INPUT_DATETIME , INPUT_IP , UPDATE_STAFF , UPDATE_DATETIME , UPDATE_IP FROM DR_MS_MAININFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND MS_SESSION_KEY = #{msSessionKey} AND IFNULL(NULLIF(MS_BLANK,''),'N') = 'N'

/* drMsMaininfoMapper.selectMsSession - MS_NUM으로 유저 정보 조회 */ SELECT MS_NUM , MS_STATUS , MS_BK_GRANT , MS_DIVISION , MS_LEVEL , MS_LOGIN_CD , MS_LINK , MS_ID , MS_PASSWORD , MS_NAME , MS_ENAME , MS_NICKNAME , MS_IMAGENAME , MS_SEX , MS_BIRTH , MS_BIRTHYL , MS_FIRST_PHONE1 , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_MID_PHONE1), 'YIDO') AS MS_MID_PHONE1 , MS_LAST_PHONE1 , SMS_CHK1 , MS_BLANK , MS_VOUCHER_DAY , MS_WEDDINGDAY , MS_WEDDING , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_EMAIL), 'YIDO') AS MS_EMAIL , MS_EMAIL_YN , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_HOMETEL), 'YIDO') AS MS_HOMETEL , MS_HOMEZIP , MS_HOMEADDR1 , MS_HOMEADDR2 , MS_POST_YN , MS_COMPNM , MS_COMPNO , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_COMPTEL), 'YIDO') AS MS_COMPTEL , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_COMPFAX), 'YIDO') AS MS_COMPFAX , MS_COMPZIP , MS_COMPADDR1 , MS_COMPADDR2 , MS_COMP_POST_YN , MS_COMPDEPT , MS_COMPPOSITION , MS_REGDAY , MS_ENDDAY , MS_REMARK , MS_MKT_AGREE_YN , MS_DORMANT , LOGIN_TIME , MS_DI , INPUT_STAFF , INPUT_DATETIME , INPUT_IP , UPDATE_STAFF , UPDATE_DATETIME , UPDATE_IP FROM DR_MS_MAININFO WHERE MS_NUM = #{msNum} AND IFNULL(NULLIF(MS_BLANK,''),'N') = 'N' LIMIT 1

SELECT MS_NUM , CONCAT(MS_FIRST_PHONE1, AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_MID_PHONE1), 'YIDO'), MS_LAST_PHONE1 ) AS MS_PHONE FROM DR_MS_MAININFO M WHERE MS_NAME = #{msName} AND NVL(MS_BLANK, 'N') = 'N' AND MS_ID = #{msId} AND MS_LOGIN_CD = 'APP' LIMIT 1
SELECT MS_BK_GRANT FROM DR_MS_MAININFO WHERE MS_ID = #{msId} AND IFNULL(NULLIF(MS_BLANK,''),'N') = 'N'
/* drMsMaininfoMapper.selectProList - 프로 목록 조회 */ SELECT * FROM DR_MS_MAININFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND MS_DIVISION = 00 AND IFNULL(NULLIF(MS_BLANK,''),'N') = 'N' AND IFNULL(NULLIF(MS_DORMANT,''),'N') = 'N'
